info_data.value:
data types :      
           1. integers 
                 1.1 signed integers
                 1.2 unsigned integers
           2. floats
           3. chars

integers :
     signed integers:

              short / short int / signed short / signed short int :
                               size : 2 bytes
		                min : -32768
		                max : 32767
		                format specifier : %hd / %hi

              int / signed int :
                      		size : 4 bytes
				min : -2147483648
				max : 2147483647
				format specifier : %i / %d

              long / long int / signed long / signed long int :
				size : 4 bytes
				min : -2147483648
				max : 2147483647
				format specifier : %ld / %li

              long long / long long int / signed long long /signed long long int :
				size : 8 bytes
				min : -9223372036854775808
				max : 9223372036854775807
				format specifier : %lld / %lli

     unsigned integers:
             
            unsigned short / unsigned short int :
				size : 2 bytes
				min : 0
				max : 65535
				format specifier : %hu
        
            unsigned int :
				size : 4 bytes
				min : 0
				max : 4294967295
				format specifier : %u

            unsigned long / unsigned long int :
				size : 4 bytes
				min : 0
				max : 4294967295
				format specifier : %lu

            unsigned long long / unsigned long long int :
				size : 8 bytes
				min : 0
				max : 18446744073709551615
				format specifier : %llu
              
floats :

          float :
			size : 4 bytes
			min : 0.000000
			max : 3.402823e+38
			format specifier : %f

          double :
			size : 8 bytes
			min : 0.000000
			max : 1.797693e+308
			format specifier : %lf

          long double :
			size : 16 bytes
			min : 0.000000
			max : 4.192040e-312
			formate specifier : %Lf

char :
		size : 1 bytes
		formate specifier : %c
note : this information is for 32 bit compilers
